issue.title: build: set _LIBCPP_DEBUG=1 in depends when debugging for darwin
issue.body:
#21869 added `-D_LIBCPP_DEBUG=1` to the Linux CPPFLAGS in depends. Ideally we could add this to the darwin CPPFLAGS in depends as well, however that does not work out of the box.

Related: https://libcxx.llvm.org/docs/DesignDocs/DebugMode.html.

issue.title: prevector: enforce is_trivially_copyable_v
issue.body: prevector uses `memmove` to move around data, that means it can only be used with types that are trivially copyable. That implies that the types are trivially destructible, thus the checks for `is_trivially_destructible` are not needed.
